message.heading: Yes. Yes. I'm George. George McFly. I'm your density. I mean, your destiny.

message.heading: No, no, no, no, no, this sucker's electrical, but I need a nuclear reaction to generate the 1.21 gigawatts of electricity I need.

message.heading: Anyway, your Grandpa hit him with the car and brought him into the house. He seemed so helpless, like a little lost puppy, and my heart just went out to him.
